div.div:
meta: remove extra [] from README
Summary: Probably intended to add a link to the directory, but now at the name field.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Read the diff.
Reviewers: O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D486

CI(codeql): test js/ts file only
Summary: If they don't touch js/ts files, there's no point testing it.
Also modify yamllint to allow 1 space before cmt.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: - codeql: land and see codeql runs - yamllint: `arc lint`.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D470

CI(GitHub Actions): use bash script to run some flaky tests
Summary: Yeah, suppressing them old weird way.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: land and wait for tests.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #github_actions
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D469

CI(npm): `npm dedupe`
Summary: Once renovate takes over the cleanup jobs, I'll probably no longer think about this though...
(Also add some yarn generated files to arclint ignore, prep for D468)
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm ci`

pages(/pronoun-is/): rename
Summary: Previous name was too long, and pronouns.page is loaded with ads (I didn't realize because I had adblocker), so just internalize this.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: build and browse the tests. Also verify unit tests run successfully.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Tags: #cloudflare_pages, #docusaurus
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D477

Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi

pages(/contact-method/): fix matrix username scheme
Summary: Correct scheme is @user:server, not user@server. Prolly confused w/ mastodon/email syntax.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Read the diff.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
